title: Appointment Scheduler
bookingSuccess: Congratulations! You have successfully booked this appointment!
bookingError: Sorry. There was an error in booking this appointment. Try Again.
cancelConfirmation: You have successfully canceled your appointment.
cancelWarning: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment?
rescheduleConfirmation: Congrats! You have successfully rescheduled this appointment!
rescheduleError: Sorry. There was an error in rescheduling this appointment. Try Again.
